name: Ball Pit
description:
This started out as my submission for Ludum Dare 37, but after the initial project hit some major setbacks in the first few hours I just started experimenting with Unity. Eventually I managed to get something moderately entertaining out of it.

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, Mouse moves the camera.

It has a lot wrong with it still: Controls, framerate, lighting, materials, resource management, probably all sorts of others I'm not thinking of right now. But I actually kinda want to keep working on this, just as a fun little side project.
